message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price of $125. This product has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly special.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. However, my budget is $120. Would you be willing to consider $115?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. Let me see if I can accommodate your offer. How about $120 for the product?
